import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./header.css" const Header = () => { //R window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const scrollUp = document.querySelector(".scrollup"); if (this.scrollY >= 960) scrollUp.classList.add("show-scroll"); else scrollUp.classList.remove("show-scroll"); }) /*Toggle Menu */ const[Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false) return (
